content: बहिस् {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} Out of, outside (with <ab>abl.</ab>); निवसन्नावसथे पुराद्बहिः <ls>R. 8. 14</ls>; <ls n="R.">11. 29.</ls> {@--2@} On the outside, out of doors (<ab>opp.</ab> अंतः); बहिर्गच्छ {@--3@} Externally, outwardly; अंतर्बहिः पुरत एव विवर्तमानां <ls>Māl. 1. 40</ls>, <ls n="Māl. 1.">14</ls>; <ls>H. 1. 94</ls> {@--4@} A part, separately. {@--5@} Beside, except.
